sympy.sympy.printing.pretty.pretty_symbo:
def pretty_use_unicode(flag=None):
    """Set whether pretty-printer should use unicode by default"""
    global _use_unicode, unicode_warnings
    if flag is None:
        return _use_unicode

    if flag and unicode_warnings:
        # print warnings (if any) on first unicode usage
        warnings.warn(unicode_warnings)
        unicode_warnings = ''

    use_unicode_prev = _use_unicode
    _use_unicode = flag
    return use_unicode_prev
sympy.sympy.printing.pretty.stringpict.<:
pictures = ["\n".join(picture) for picture in pictures]

# Add spacers between sub-pictures
sympy.sympy.printing.pretty.stringpict.t:
def terminal_width(self):
    """Return the terminal width if possible, otherwise return 0.
    """
    size = shutil.get_terminal_size(fallback=(0, 0))
    return size.columns
